meanings.def: (especially in the past) a person who fights in a battle or war
examples: a warrior nation (= whose people are skilled in fighting)
He views himself as a holy warrior.
the armchair warriors at the Department of Defense
the graves of the fallen warriors
the last of the ancient warriors
A Viking warrior would be buried with his weapons: usually his sword, spear, shield and battleaxe.

meanings.def: a person who leads or takes part in a campaign for a political or social cause, especially in an aggressive way that other people think is bad
examples: These social justice warriors want to apply their politically correct standards and rules to others' speech.
